ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Any tips for Wizards?
ygData.msgSnippet: I can only give advice that says to go to everlore.com and find that guide written by an Iksar.  Telling in detail how to get at least dubious faction with the
ygData.messageBody:
I can only give advice that says to go to everlore.com and find that guide
written by an Iksar. Telling in detail how to get at least dubious faction
with the area of Qeynos.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [SMTP:suceress@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 18, 2001 7:15 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] Any tips for Wizards?
>
> I have a lvl 14 DE Wizard. I'm trying to figure out the best way to get
> good
> faction with other races without destroying faction with my own race (just
> yet). I've run into the problem that anything I do that gets me in good
> with
> the clerics and paladins kills my faction with freeport militia...
> What should I do?
> luv,
> -Su
>
>
